post.title: Day 15 - Friday, January 15, 2021
post.content:
This is the third and last time i am going to talk about DevTools Lighthouse Report on my site. As I wrote two times before that I ran a Lighthouse report on my site to check what the website is lacking in terms of Performance, Best Practices and SEO and the site was lacking everything and anything according to the report.

So I tried to fix some things and today ran the test again and got the following results.

Fixing some little things helped my site to be little more fast and better.

What I Learned Today

💻 Programming

  • Gatsby JS Guides - I read some GatsbyJs Guides on Sourcing Data into Pages and also read MDX which is just like JSX where you can add React code into Markdown Files.

🗾 Langauge[日本語]

  • 怖い (こわい) Scared.
  • 枝 (えだ) Branch. Like a Branch of Tree.
  • 他所 (たしょ) Another Place.
